Darcy et al-
	I can't remember where I saw them but I believe indeed there are 
videos, there are definitely audio tapes. There is surely audio and 
video in Japan as well of many of  the Post war greats. There are 
gentlemen alive today who should be recorded before their knowledge is 
lost to us.
	I know it is a simple thing to do,but again our enemy is inertia. The 
material is there, one more dragon we need to work on slaying...
-t

not sure which list I am on...
